title: Amali Thumali Lyrics Ko Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers : Hariharan, Swetha Mohan & Chinmayi
Song: Amali Thumali
Lyrics : Viveka
Movie: Ko

Amali Thumli neliyum veyli, Ennai kavvi kondathey
Alagu Idupin oru paathi ennai allichendrathey
coloumbus kanavilum ninaikatha oru desam alaikuthey
Koluthum veyililum enna kulae kulir kaatrum veesuthey

Roja poovum..Adi mullil pookum ena ariveney
Pena mullil..Indha poovum poothathoru maayam
Maari Maari..Unnai parka solli vizhi kenjum
Endhan nenjodu nenjodu kadhal pongi vaarudhey

Amali Thumli neliyum veyli, Ennai kavvi kondathey
Alagu Idupin oru pathi ennai allichendrathey....hey
coloumbus kanavilum ninaikatha oru desam alaikuthey
Koluthum veyililum enna kulae kulir kaatrum veesuthey

Vaa ena sollavum thayakam..
Manam poo ena thallavum marukkum
Ingu kadhalin paathayil aanaithum,
Ada perungulapam...

Aarugal aruginil irundhum
Adai malai adhu so enna polindhum
Adi nee mattum thoorathil irunthal
Naav varandu vidum.....

ey ku vaa kuvaa kuvaa kuvvaa... kuyilethu..
ey th vaa thava thava thavvaa... Manamedhu..

ohhh.. Mudhal mazhai nanaithadhai poley
Mudhal karai adainthadhai poley
kuthikiren kuthikiren mela.. aaruyirey...

ohhh.. Enaku unnai koduthadhu pothum
Tharai thoda marukuthu paatham
Enakini urakamum thooram..Dhevathaiye..

Kaalkalil aadidum kolusu
Adhan oosaikal bhoomiku pudhusu
Adhai kadhugal ketidum pozhudhu
Naan kaviarasu

Merkilum sooriyan udikum,
Neer minmini sootilum kothikum
Ada aruginil nee ulla varaikum miga mana manakum..

ey po vaa povaa povaa po vaa siripaaley
ey av vaa avvaa avvaa avvaa theerthayae

hey sudamalae anigalan illai
thodamalay udal palan illai
vida malae manathinil tholai. kaaadhaliyae

Thoda thoda inithana illai
Idai veli migunthidum thollai
Adaiyellam magilchiyin ellai. Koodaliye oh..

Amali Thumli neliyum veyli, Ennai kavvi kondathe
Alagu Idupin oru paathi ennai allichendrathey
coloumbus kanavilum ninaikatha oru desam alaikuthe
Koluthum veyililum enna kulae kulir kaatrum veesuthe

Roja poovum..Adi mullil pookum ena arivene
Pena mullil..Indha poovum poothathoru maayam
Maari Maari..Unnai parka solli vizhi kenjum
Endhan nenjodu nenjodu kadhal pongi vaarudhey
